system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Space 4 (illusory duplicates)  
**Supporting Energy:** Time 2 (duration 1 minute)  
**Range:** Self  
**Duration:** 1 minute  
**Total Cost:** 6 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (1 action)  
**Weaving Roll:** Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Create 3 illusory duplicates of yourself. When attacked, roll 1d8: 1-2 = hits you, 3-8 = hits a duplicate (which is destroyed). Each duplicate destroyed removes 2 from the "hits duplicate" range.  
**Saving Throw:** None (beneficial buff, self-only)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 1 duplicate (1 round), 2 = 3 duplicates (full effect), 3 = 4 duplicates (10 minutes), 4 = 6 duplicates (1 hour)
